title: Identification key
description: An identification key, containing knowledge that may be used to distinguish taxa from each other.

media.description: The logo/illustration image of the key.

descriptionIntro.description: Short description of the key (valid html).

descriptionDetails.description: Extended description of the key that supplements the descriptionIntro (valid html).

descriptionUrl.description: Hyperlink to more information on the key (valid url).

examples: Koch, Wouter (2019). Birds of Norway. ISBN 1234567890

sourceUrl.description: Hyperlink to the source of the key (valid url).

region.description: The region for which the key is valid (e.g. covers all subtaxa).

creator.description: The name(s) of the creator(s) of the key

creatorUrl.description: Hyperlink to more information on the creator of the key (valid url).

publisher.description: The publising institution of the key.

publisherUrl.description: Hyperlink to more information on the publisher of the key (valid url).

license.description: The url to the license under which the key falls.

language.description: The ISO 639-1 code(s) of the key language(s).
language.comment: String for a single language, array of strings for multilingual support. If used as an array, be sure to use the localizedString and localizedUrl as arrays too.

lastModified.description: The most recent moment the key was modified, as 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'.

externalServices.description: Services used by the key for lookups of images, taxa, etc.

levelsOfExpertise.description: Levels of expertise the various characters require, so that the user can be warned, helped, etc.

taxa.description: Taxa (e.g. species) the key can resolve to. Do not have to be exclusively taxonomic units.
taxa.comment: Taxa to which the key can resolve. Either the taxa directly or their children. SubTaxonimic taxa (such as morphs, genders, life stages) should be presented through their parent only.

characters.description: Characters (questions, e.g. 'Wing color' or 'Number of spots') used to distinguish between two or more taxa.

statements.description: Relationships between taxa and character states (or lack thereof) that define those taxa.

localizedString.description: Language-dependent string or array of strings, corresponding to the languages supported by the key.

localizedUrl.description: Language-dependent urls or array of urls, corresponding to the languages supported by the key.

localizedMediaElement.description: Language-dependent media element or array of media elements, corresponding to the languages supported by the key.

url.description: String formed as a url, or an external resource.

validId.description: String used as an internal ID. Lowercase alphanumerical and underscores are allowed.

file.description: The actual image (blob or svg) or reference to the image (url or resource).

width.description: The number of pixels horizontally (if a bitmap).

height.description: The number of pixels vertically (if a bitmap).

creator.description: The name(s) of the creator(s) of the image

publisher.description: The publising institution of the image.

license.description: The url to the license under which the image falls.

mediaElement.description: A media element (various sizes if of the bitmap type).

type.Description: Whether the image is a vector or a bitmap type image.

thumbnail.Description: Smallest (>100px) version of the image. Only if bitmap type.

small.Description: Small (>400px) version of the image. Only if bitmap type.

medium.Description: Medium  (>700px) version of the image. Only if bitmap type.

large.Description: Large (>1000px) version of the image. Only if bitmap type.

full.Description: Full resolution version of the image. Only if bitmap type.

serviceId.description: The id to one of the externalServices defined.

externalId.description: The id of the resource at the externalService.

externalService.description: Service used by the key, for images, taxonomy and/or nomenclature, etc.

id.description: Internally unique id to the service.

descriptionIntro.description: Short description of the level of expertise required (valid html).

descriptionDetails.description: Extended description of the level of expertise required that supplements the descriptionIntro (valid html).

descriptionUrl.description: Hyperlink to more information on the level of expertise required (valid url).

media.description: Media or illustration that informs the user on the level of expertise.

id.description: Internally unique id to the taxon.

scientificNameAuthor.description: Author string of the scientific name of the taxon.

placeholderName.description: Name that can be shown while fetching the name externally. Also useful for editing the key.

taxonLevel.description: Name of the level of the taxon.

isSubTaxonimic.description: Whether or not this is a sub-class of a true taxon (such as a morph, life stage, sex, etc), or an actual taxon.

isEndPoint.description: Given that isSubTaxonimic is true for this taxon, should the key continue until this is the only remaining possibility, or stop at its parent?

externalReference.description: Reference to a taxon at a provider, as an object wiht a provider id and a taxon id at that provider.

id.description: Internally unique id to the character.

media.description: The illustration/image of the character. Can be used to inform user of relevant structures etc.

descriptionIntro.description: Short description of the character (valid html).

descriptionDetails.description: Extended description of the character that supplements the descriptionIntro (valid html).

descriptionUrl.description: Hyperlink or resource to more information on the character.

type.description: Type of the character (exclusive when states are catagorical and mutually exclusive, multistate when these are non-exclusive, or numerical when the state is numerical).

requiredExpertise.description: Id to the levelOfExpertise required to answer this character.
requiredExpertise.comment: Has to be one of the levelsOfExpertise defined on the key level.

logicalRequirement.description: Logical requirement that has to be fulfilled for this question to be asked.
logicalRequirement.comment: Has to refer to stateIds, that have to be fully true (either answered or all alternatives ruled out). Can use !, &&, ||, (, ), <, >, =.

state.description: The value a character can have.

id.description: Internally unique id of the state.

string.comment: Only to be used for catergorical characters. Accepts array for multilingual support.

descriptionIntro.description: Short description of the state (valid html).

descriptionDetails.description: Extended description of the state that supplements the descriptionIntro (valid html).

descriptionUrl.description: Hyperlink or resource to more information on the state.

min.description: Lowest numerical value of the state (over all taxa).
min.comment: Only to be used for numerical characters

max.description: Highest possible numerical value of the state (over all taxa).
max.comment: Only to be used for numerical characters

stepSize.description: Step size of the state (steps between min and max, over all taxa).
stepSize.comment: Only to be used for numerical characters

unit.description: Unit in which the state is measured or counted.
unit.comment: Only to be used for numerical characters. Accepts array for multilingual support.

statement.description: A fact connecting a taxon and a character through a certain value.

id.description: Internally unique id of the statement.

taxonId.description: Id of the taxon this statement is about.

characterId.description: Id of the character this statement is about.

value.description: A value for this character for this taxon. Must be either the id of a state, or an array of floats [min, max] for a numerical range.

frequency.description: The frequency with which the taxon has this value for this character.

media.description: An illustration of this particular taxon having this particular property (this value for this character).

descriptionIntro.description: Short description of the taxon having this property (valid html).

descriptionDetails.description: Extended description of the taxon having this property that supplements the descriptionIntro (valid html).

descriptionUrl.description: Hyperlink or resource to more information on the taxon having this property.
